scripts.build:dist: npm run build:clean && npm run build:umd
scripts.test: karma start --single-run && npm run build:dist && npm run build:clean
scripts.gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && git merge master --no-edit --no-ff && npm run build:demo && npm run compodoc && git add . && git commit -m "chore: build demo and docs" && git push && git checkout master
scripts.copyfiles: copyfiles package.json LICENSE README.md CHANGELOG.md dist
scripts.release:git: git add package.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version number" && standard-version --first-release && git push --follow-tags origin master
scripts.release:npm: npm run build:dist && npm run copyfiles && npm publish dist
scripts.release: npm run compodoc && npm run release:git && npm run release:npm
scripts.postrelease: npm run build:clean && npm run gh-pages
